entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of thunderstorms. Snow level 600 metres. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023
